home.title: Welcome to Ubiq
home.desc: Ubiq is a community-run Proof-of-Work blockchain and smart contract platform powering decentralized applications, tokens, NFTs and much more.

slug.fallback: No {0} version available. Falling back to {1}.

sparrow.title: Sparrow
sparrow.desc: Sparrow equips you with a key vault, secure login and token wallet â€” everything you need to manage your digital assets. Sparrow is the recommended hot wallet for dapp interactions. Sparrow provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. You can also use Sparrow to interact with hardware wallets such as Trezor and Ledger.

pyrus.title: Pyrus
pyrus.desc: Pyrus is a browser based, client-side Ubiq wallet. Generate wallets completely client side, easily send Ubiq and any ERC-20 Standard Token (e.g GEO, ESCH), generate and send offline transactions, ensuring your private keys never touch an internet-connected device.

trezor.title: Trezor
trezor.desc: Trezor is hardware wallet device compatible with Ubiq. It can interface with both Pyrus and Sparrow to securely manage balances and transfers, as well as interactions with smart contracts/dapps such as shinobi and enmaku.

ledger.title: Ledger
ledger.desc: The Ledger Nano S is a highly secure hardware wallet solution that is compatible with Pyrus, MEW and Sparrow. Private keys remain encrypted on a USB device with robust security features, making it one of the safest ways to store your funds.

gubiq.title: Gubiq
gubiq.desc: Gubiq (go-ubiq) is the core client and backbone of the Ubiq network. Used by developers, services, nodes and running behind the scenes for both Pyrus & Sparrow users.

fusion.title: Fusion
fusion.desc: Bringing together all of your accounts, assets and application interfaces, the Fusion Wallet combines all Ubiq blockchain functionality into one secure and powerful interface. Providing a full node with all of the tools to write and deploy your own smart contracts and tokens.

sparrow.title: Install Sparrow
sparrow.conflict: Do not install Sparrow in the same browser as MetaMask, a conflict will occur.
sparrow.box1text: key sparrow equips you with a vault, secure login, and token wallet - everything you need to manage your digital assets.
sparrow.box2text: Sparrow provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. Ensuring you are always in control when interacting on the new decentralized web.
